thread.title: it very clean ,lovely and alot of foreigners here
thread.title_full: it very clean ,lovely and alot of foreigners here - Review of Hilton Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Jane N
title: it very clean ,lovely and alot of foreigners here
text:
good location ,convenient for site seeing ,not far from the airport, clean ,the service is good but the rooms are small and outdated I think they should renovate it .I should advice those who go visit there especially if is your first time in Beijing ,a map should your bestfriend.
also if you would want to go somewhere else with foreigners ,I would recommend saliton .all the best in your journey fox
Room Tip: standard room especially if you alone is fantastic ,is not big but its okie See more room tips
